atk-s0402a49:2_1: Catutthassa paṭhame upapattipaṭilābhiyānīti yehi anantarā upapattiṁ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a49:2_3: Sakadāgāmissāti idaṁ appahīnasaṁyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahitaṁ.
atk-s0402a49:2_4: Yasmā pana antarāparinibbāyissa antarā upapatti natthi, yaṁ pana so tattha jhānaṁ samāpajjati, taṁ kusalattā “upapattibhavassa paccayo” teva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
atk-s0402a49:2_5: Tasmāssa “upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṁyojanāni appahīnānī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a49:2_6: Orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṁ upādāya sakadāgāmissa avisesena “orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni appahīnānī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a49:4_1: Dutiye yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhānoti pañhaṁ kathento yuttameva katheti, sīghaṁ pana na katheti, saṇikameva kathetīti attho.
atk-s0402a49:6_0: 133. Tatiye catunnampi puggalānaṁ iminā suttena viseso veditabbo –
atk-s0402a49:7_0: “Katamo ca puggalo ugghaṭitaññū, yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo ugghaṭitaññū.
atk-s0402a49:7_1: Katamo ca puggalo vipañcitaññū, yassa puggalassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū.
atk-s0402a49:7_2: Katamo ca puggalo neyyo, yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo neyyo.
atk-s0402a49:7_3: Katamo ca puggalo padaparamo, yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo padaparamo”ti.
atk-s0402a49:9_1: Catutthe uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṁ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṁ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṁ kappeti, taṁ pana uṭṭhānaṁ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṁ nappaṭilabhati, ayaṁ uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī na kammaphalūpajīvī nāma.
atk-s0402a49:9_2: Cātumahārājike pana deve ādiṁ katvā sabbepi devā uṭṭhānavīriyena vinā puññaphalasseva upajīvanato kammaphalūpajīvino na uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino nāma.
atk-s0402a49:9_5: Imasmiṁ sutte puññaphalameva kammaphalanti adhippetaṁ, tañca tesaṁ natthi.
atk-s0402a49:11_1: Pañcame paṭhamo andhabālaputhujjano, dutiyo antarantarā kusalakārako lokiyaputhujjano, tatiyo sotāpanno, sakadāgāmianāgāminopi eteneva saṅgahitā.
atk-s0402a49:13_1: Chaṭṭhe paṭhamo lokiyamahājano, dutiyo sukkhavipassako sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca, tatiyo anāgāmī.
atk-s0402a49:13_2: So hi yasmā taṅkhaṇikampi upapattinimittakaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilabhatiyeva, tasmā sukkhavipassakopi samādhismiṁ paripūrakārīyeva.
atk-s0402a49:13_4: So hi sabbesaṁ sīlādipaccanīkānaṁ pahīnattā sabbattha paripūrakārī nāma.
atk-s0402a49:15_3: Kāyeneva gāmato nikkhanto, cittena araññe vasantopi gāmameva paviṭṭhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a49:17_2: Na kusalā hotīti na chekā hoti.
atk-s0402a49:19_1: Dasame atthato pariyādānaṁ gacchatīti aṭṭhakathaṁ pucchito pariyādānaṁ parikkhayaṁ gacchati, kathetuṁ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a49:19_2: No byañjanatoti byañjanaṁ panassa pavattati na pariyādiyati.
